{{also|fur|fuer|Fur|Fuer|fúr|fûr|fur.}} ==German== ===Alternative forms=== * {{alter|de|f.||abbreviation}} * {{l|de|vor}} ''(obsolete)'' * {{l|de|fuer}} ''(nonstandard-spelling)'' ===Etymology=== From {{etyl|goh|de}} {{m|goh|furi}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/fyːr/|/fyːɐ̯/|/fʏɐ̯/}} {{a|standard}} * {{IPA|de|/fə/}} {{a|reduced form in common speech}} * {{audio|de|De-für.ogg|audio}} * {{homophones|de|führ}} * {{rhymes|de|yːɐ̯}} ===Preposition=== {{head|de|preposition}} {{tlb|de|takes accusative}} # [[for]] #: {{ux|de|Das Geschenk ist '''für''' dich.|The present is '''for''' you.}} # [[in favor of]], in [[support]] of #: {{ux|de|Ich bin '''für''' die erste Option.|I'm '''in favor of''' the first option.}} # by the standards of #: {{ux|de|'''Für''' einen Ausländer sprichst du sehr gut Deutsch.|'''For''' a foreigner, you speak German very well.}} # [[on behalf of]] #: {{ux|de|Mein Anwalt wird das '''für''' mich beantworten.|My lawyer will answer to that '''on''' my '''behalf'''.}} # {{lb|de|informal}} [[instead of]] #: {{ux|de|'''Für''' die Hose hab ich jetzt den Rock genommen.|'''Instead of''' the trousers [which I chose not to buy], I took the skirt.}} # {{lb|de|colloquial|nonstandard}} [[in order to]] (with {{m|de|zu}} and infinitive) #: {{ux|de|Der Papa holt das Werkzeug, '''für''' die Waschmaschine zu reparieren.|Daddy is getting his tools '''in order to''' repair the washing machine.}} ====Synonyms==== * {{qualifier|in order (to)}} {{l|de|um}} {{qualifier|standard usage}} ====Derived terms==== * {{l|de|dafür}} * {{l|de|was für}} * ('''''für''' + das'') {{l|de|fürs}} ---- ==Vilamovian== ===Pronunciation=== * {{audio|wym|Wym-für (wersja Józefa Gary).ogg|Audio}} ===Noun=== {{wym-noun|f}} # {{rfdef|wym}}
